page.title: 01THURNSCOE - A MINING VILLAGE
page.content: Thurnscoe has a bowling green, sports ground and some swimming baths. Thurnscoe is a{mining village}near Rotherham. We have a good cheap bus service to Doncaster, Barnsley, Sheffield and Mexborough. In Thurnscoe there are two different junior{schools,}Gooseacre and The Hill, each having their own Nursery departments. There is a Comprehensive school which has tennis courts. In Thurnscoe on Mondays and Fridays there is a Market. We have a{pit}but it is reducing in capacity, so many jobs are being lost. Around Thurnscoe there are many corn fields. We have a flower park there is a playground. There is a clinic and an old peoples home outside the park. Thurnscoes oldest school was Houghton Road, built soon after the pit was sunk, it was demolished in 1984 after rationalisation.
